description: Numerators of convergents to Champernowne constant (A033307).
references: E. B. Burger, Diophantine Olympics ..., Amer. Math. Monthly, 107 (Nov. 2000), 822-829.
mathematica: Module[{champ=FromDigits[Flatten[IntegerDigits/@Range[20]]]}, Numerator[ Convergents[ champ/10^IntegerLength[champ]]]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 17 2014 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 24 2000
